quote: A sedentary life is the real sin against the Holy Spirit. Only those thoughts that come by walking have any value.
A man who dares to waste one hour of his life has not discovered the value of life.
I value my garden more for being full of blackbirds than of cherries, and very frankly give them fruit for their songs.
It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value.
The New is not a fashion, it is a value.
A certain degree of neurosis is of inestimable value as a drive, especially to a psychologist.
A check or credit card, a Gucci bag strap, anything of value will do. Give as you live.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
A person's worth in this world is estimated according to the value they put on themselves.
